item.title: Need Help With Transformation
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

I can get a transformation to work when an item is equipped, but only one item works. For example, I can make a santa hat transform me into santa, but none of my other commands would work. Here’s what I have in client.java…

[code] //Infernal Mage
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] ==6070== true){
npcId = 1643;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] ==6070== false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

	//Stone
	else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){
		npcId = 2626;
		isNpc = true;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){
		isNpc = false;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} [/code]

This only allows the Ring of Stone command to work. Help please?

Read full topic
